summary: Dremora resources for use with both male and female dremora.
descriptionHtml:
Detail maps, modified horns and new eye textures for modders to use for making more unique looking dremora lords. Has both male and female assets (horns are unisex)
This is not usable as a functioning mod in its own right.
No permissions necessary. Just credit me if you use them.
This is a rework of previous assets mod, the original assets that were available then are still available in the DL now.

There are 12 Horns
4 Eye textures
and 4 detail maps (female/male rough/clean versions)

For the purposes of the screenshots, I put the horns in the Beards headpart
author: Hallgarth
